name: Lucas di Grassi
status: Pirelli test driverCompeting in Formula E
introduction: Lucas Tucci di Grassi (born August 11, 1984 in So Paulo, So Paulo State, Brazil) is a Brazilian race driver who participated in the 2010 Formula One Season, driving for the Virgin team. Aside from racing for Virgin, Di Grassi has been a test driver for the Renault team and is currently the Pirelli test driver.
